ssot__SalesOrderProduct__dlm.name: Sales Order Product
ssot__SalesOrderProduct__dlm.description: The Sales Order Product DMO represents a product or service being sold to the customer as part of a sales order.

ssot__AdjustedDeliveryTaxAmount__c.description: The roll up number of sales order product tax rows associated with delivery fees.

ssot__Commenttext__c.description: A message that is displayed to the customer during order creation.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__cc.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeliveryTaxAmount__c.description: The amount of tax owed for delivery.

ssot__Description__c.description: The description of the sales order product.

ssot__DiscountAmount__c.description: The discount amount applied to each order line item.

ssot__DiscountAmountCurrency__c.description: A reference ID to the denomination of currency for the discount amount.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to system that External Record ID was assigned.

ssot__GiftOrderMessagetext__c.description: The text message on a gift order.

ssot__GiftRecipientTelephonenumber__c.description: The phone number of a gift recipient.

ssot__HandlingCostAmountCurrency__c.description: A reference ID to the denomination of currency for the handling cost amount.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsAutomaticallyRenewed__c.description: An indicator if a subscription-type product can be automatically renewed or was selected for auto-renewal.

ssot__IsBonusProduct__c.description: An indicator if the sales order item is a bonus or free product added to an order.

ssot__IsBundleRoot__c.description: An indicator whether it’s an element of a bundled product.

ssot__IsGift__c.description: An indicator that the sales order is a gift.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LineAdjustmentSubTotalAmount__c.description: The subtotal amount of a line adjustment.

ssot__ListPriceAmount__c.description: The list price amount for one unit of a sales order product.

ssot__ListPriceAmountCurrency__c.description: The denomination of currency for the list price amount.

ssot__ListPriceQuantityUOMId__c.description: A reference ID to a unit of measure for the list price of a physical product, for example, a box, case, or palette.

ssot__ListPriceTermUOMId__c.description: A reference ID to a unit of measure for list price for a product with a subscription term, for example, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.

ssot__OrderProductnumber__c.description: An automatically generated number that identifies a sales order product.

ssot__OrderedQuantity__c.description: The number of units of sales order product.

ssot__OriginalOrderProductId__c.description: A reference ID to the original sales order product being reduced.

ssot__PricebookEntryId__c.description: A reference ID related to an entry within a price book.

ssot__ProductId__c.description: A reference ID to what's being sold, for example, goods, services, bundles, and made-to-order products.

ssot__PromisedDate__c.description: The start date for sales order product.

ssot__ProvisioningDate__c.description: The date when the seller expects to provision a service or product.

ssot__QuantityFulfilled__c.description: The quantity of a sales order product that is provided.

ssot__QuantityOrderedUOMId__c.description: A reference ID to a unit of measure for quantity of sales order product ordered, for example item, box, or palette.

ssot__QuoteLineItemId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated quote line item.

ssot__RecurringPriceAmount__c.description: A charge incurred by the buyer on a recurring basis.

ssot__RequestedEndDate__c.description: The date when a product or service ends.

ssot__RequestedStartDate__c.description: The date when a product or service begins, from a sales order perspective.

ssot__SalesOrderId__c.description: A reference ID to the related sales order.

ssot__SalesOrderDeliveryGroupId__c.description: A reference ID to the sales order delivery group.

ssot__SalesOrderProductAdjustedTaxAmount.description: The amount of taxes including any adjustments.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Sales Order Product DMO.

ssot__SalesOrderProductReasonId__c.description: A reference ID to the reason code for sales order product.

ssot__SalesOrderProductStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of sales order product in order, for example Placed or Activated.

ssot__SalesOrderProductNotes__c.description: Any notes related to a sales order.

ssot__SegmentIndexId__c.description: A reference ID to the number used with segment indexes for pricing subscriptions.

ssot__SegmentIndexnumber__c.description: A number used for pricing subscriptions, where subperiods of the overall subscription are priced differently, and the pricing can change.

ssot__SellerAccountId__c.description: A reference ID to the seller account assigned to a sales order product.

ssot__ShippingCostAmountCurrency__c.description: A denomination of currency for shipping cost amount.

ssot__ShippingTaxAmountCurrency__c.description: The denomination of currency for shipping tax amount.

ssot__SubscriptionRenewalMonthQuantity__.description: The length of time of subscription, in months, of sales order item.

ssot__SubscriptionTermQuantity__c.description: The quantity of a subscription term.

ssot__SubscriptionTermUnitId__c.description: A reference ID to a unit of measure for a subscription term.

ssot__TotalAdjustmentTaxAmount__c.description: The total amount of taxes after adjustment.

ssot__TotalDistributedTaxAmount__c.description: The total line level taxes on distributed adjustments.

ssot__TotalLineAdjustmentAmount__c.description: The amount of any adjustment on a line item of an order.

ssot__TotalLineAmount__c.description: The amount of a line item of an order.

ssot__TotalListPriceAmount__c.description: The list price of a product.

ssot__TotalManualAdjustmentAmount__c.description: The total amount of any adjustments.

ssot__TotalPriceAmount__c.description: The total price of an order.

ssot__TotalProductTaxAmount__c.description: The total tax amount on a specific product.

ssot__TotalRecurringPriceAmount__c.description: The total price of recurring charges for subscription products that have recurring charges.

ssot__TotalTaxAmount__c.description: The total tax owed on an order.

ssot__TotalUnitPriceAmount__c.description: The total amount of the unit price.

ssot__UnitPriceAmount__c.description: The cost of one unit of product for each customer, which overrides the standard list price.

ssot__UnitPriceAmountCurrency__c.description: A reference ID to the denomination of currency for the unit price amount.

ssot__UnitTaxAmount__c.description: The unit tax amount for sales order product.

ssot__UnitTaxAmountCurrency__c.description: A reference ID to the denomination of currency for the unit tax amount.
